original: intros x0 y0. apply THL.soundness. apply THL.wp_complete. unfold wp. intros e [H1 H2]. destruct (gcd_partial_proof x0 y0 e H1) as [e' [Hexec Hpost]]. exists e'. split. - auto. - unfold THL.synt_wp. destruct gcd. exists (fun e : E.Env => Zis_gcd x0 y0 (VX e)), (fun _ _ => True). repeat split. + apply well_founded_ltof. + split; auto. + intros e'' _ _. rewrite <- H. auto. + intros e'' _ HU. unfold THL.synt_wp. split. * intros HEQ. apply Hexec. * intros _ _. apply Hexec.
